content:
DataControlFieldHeaderCell Class

In this Article

In accessibility scenarios, represents a header cell in the rendered table of a tabular ASP.NET data-bound control, such as GridView.

Syntax

Declaration

public class DataControlFieldHeaderCell : System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Control
  • WebControl
  • TableCell
  • System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell

Remarks

The DataControlFieldHeaderCell class is used by data tables (such as the GridView control) to represent accessible headers. Tabular controls such as DetailsView and FormView are considered layout tables, and therefore do not require accessible headers and do not use the DataControlFieldHeaderCell class.

The DataControlFieldHeaderCell class is used in two cases:

  • The UseAccessibleHeader property is true.

  • The field is a BoundField object whose DataField property is set as the RowHeaderColumn property.

    If neither is the case, a regular DataControlFieldHeaderCell object is used, which renders a <td> instead of a <th> element.

    Because the DataControlFieldHeaderCell class supports the AbbreviatedText property, it is used by the GridView control whenever the UseAccessibleHeader property is true.

Constructors summary

DataControlFieldHeaderCell(DataControlField)

Initializes a new instance of the DataControlFieldHeaderCell class, setting the specified DataControlField object as the cell's container.

Properties summary

AbbreviatedText

Gets or sets abbreviated text, which is rendered in an HTML abbr attribute and is used by screen readers.
Scope

Gets or sets the header cell's scope within an HTML table.

Methods summary

AddAttributesToRender(HtmlTextWriter)

Adds information about the table cell to the list of attributes to render.

Constructors

  • DataControlFieldHeaderCell(DataControlField)

    Initializes a new instance of the DataControlFieldHeaderCell class, setting the specified DataControlField object as the cell's container.

    public DataControlFieldHeaderCell (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField containingField);

    Parameters

    • containingField
      DataControlField

      The DataControlField that contains the current cell.

    Remarks

    The DataControlFieldHeaderCell constructor passes the System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag element as its tagKey parameter, which is the representation of the HTML tag it is rendered with. The DataControlField passed in the containingField parameter is used to determine whether to show headers and what styles to apply to the cell when it is rendered.

Properties

  • AbbreviatedText

    Gets or sets abbreviated text, which is rendered in an HTML abbr attribute and is used by screen readers.

    public virtual string AbbreviatedText { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A shortened version of the table header text, which is read by screen readers. The default value is String.

    Remarks

    The value of the AbbreviatedText property is stored in view state.

  • Scope

    Gets or sets the header cell's scope within an HTML table.

    public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope Scope { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TableHeaderScope

      One of the TableHeaderScope values. The default is TableHeaderScope.

    Remarks

    The value of the Scope property is rendered as an HTML scope attribute by the DataControlFieldHeaderCell object. Although the Scope property is initialized to TableHeaderScope, you should set it to either TableHeaderScope or TableHeaderScope, depending on the cells that the header represents.

    The value of the Scope property is stored in view state.

Methods

  • AddAttributesToRender(HtmlTextWriter)

    Adds information about the table cell to the list of attributes to render.

    protected override void AddAttributesToRender (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);

    Parameters

    • writer
      HtmlTextWriter

      An HtmlTextWriter that represents the output stream that renders HTML content to the client.

    Remarks

    The AddAttributesToRender method adds the HtmlTextWriterAttribute or HtmlTextWriterAttribute attributes if the respective Scope or AbbreviatedText properties are set.
